I've worn these shoes for about 6 months now and I can say these are GREAT. I wear them when I go to the store, when I walk the dog, when I just go out in general. I can tell a difference in the muscles of my feet and I can happily run and jump and walk without any strain in both feet when barefoot. I originally bought these because i noticed the muscles in my feet growing tired wuicker than usual. Ive been wear house slippers a ton and noticed the effects of wearing shoes all the time. These shoes really feel like you're wearing nothing and I adore them. So easy to slip on, they look great, and feel great. The bottom is extremely bendy and your toes get full movement. At first, your feet will feel a little tired wearing them if you've been wearing shoes and slippers  consistently. But after a while, your feet will really thank you :) Thank you for such wonderful shoes, I cannot believe the benefits I got with such a small price to pay.

After returning the shoes through UPS and receiving a refund, a month later, I got a message saying they never received the return and are now asking me to pay for the shoes. If they didn’t receive the shoes, why issue a refund in the first place? I’ve already thrown away the receipt, so this is really frustrating.  As for the shoes themselves, they were uncomfortable to wear. The sole is very thin, making them unsuitable for rocky stream areas. If you need durable, supportive footwear, I’d recommend looking elsewhere.
